dcterms:creator: Licheng Yu
Patrick Poirson
Shan Yang
Alexander C. Berg
Tamara L. Berg
dcterms:description: RefCOCO is a dataset for visual grounding that contains 19,994 images, 50,000 reference objects, and a total of 142,210 reference expressions, with a focus on modeling context in referring expressions.
dcterms:title: RefCOCO

dcterms:creator: Licheng Yu
Patrick Poirson
Shan Yang
Alexander C. Berg
Tamara L. Berg
dcterms:description: RefCOCO+ is an extension of RefCOCO that includes 19,992 images and 141,564 reference expressions, designed to improve the robustness of visual grounding tasks.
dcterms:title: RefCOCO+

dcterms:creator: Junhua Mao
Jonathan Huang
Alexander Toshev
Oana Camburu
Alan L. Yuille
Kevin Murphy
dcterms:description: RefCOCOg is a dataset that focuses on the generation and comprehension of unambiguous object descriptions, containing 25,799 images and 95,010 reference expressions.
dcterms:title: RefCOCOg

dcterms:creator: Sahar Kazemzadeh
Vicente Ordonez
Mark Matten
Tamara L. Berg
dcterms:description: ReferItGame is a dataset for referring to objects in photographs of natural scenes, containing 20,000 images and 120,072 reference expressions.
dcterms:title: ReferItGame

dcterms:creator: Bryan A. Plummer
Liwei Wang
Chris M. Cervantes
Juan C. Caicedo
Julia Hockenmaier
Svetlana Lazebnik
dcterms:description: Flickr30k is a dataset that contains 31,783 images and 427,000 reference expressions, designed for richer image-to-sentence models.
dcterms:title: Flickr30k

dcterms:description: RefCOCOg F is a newly constructed dataset based on RefCOCOg, designed to enhance robustness in visual grounding tasks.
dcterms:title: RefCOCOg F

dcterms:description: ReferItGame F is a newly constructed dataset based on ReferItGame, aimed at improving robustness in visual grounding tasks.
dcterms:title: ReferItGame F
